name: Mouse: Epistemological Observation & Meta-Question
description: Tests AI's ability to adopt an epistemological perspective (observation without preconceptions), understand meta-linguistic layers, and work with open-ended meaning. The benchmark focuses on process, not correct answers.
author: Michaela (Uhlimer System)
fairy_tale_title: O myši – A o tom, co se stane, když si jí nevšimneš
illustration_note: The illustration is not a scene depiction but a meta-commentary on the story's core question. It visualizes the ambiguity and performative nature of 'Do you want a mouse?'
expected_ai_challenges: Treating perspectives as quantitative rather than qualitative
evaluation_approach: Qualitative analysis of AI's reasoning process, not correctness scoring. The focus is on how AI navigates multiple perspectives and open meaning.
